Sincere apologies to all for the inane ramblings of my ignorant countryman, "trobz08"

Please remember that we have our fair share of morons like every other country on earth.

Dunning-Kruger... Confirmation bias... All the usual suspects.

Smart enough to articulate the spoon-fed propaganda in (mostly) complete sentences, but too limited to see beneath the thin veneer of same. He has his frame, and he'll cling to it for dear life all of his remaining days.

In order for a serf to happily accept his lot in life (even to the point of passionately defending those responsible), he has to believe the entire story.... all of it... y'pull on one string, and the narrative unravels. That's why people like him never venture beyond the sanitized, censored, woefully incomplete version of the 'history' of his country that the wealthy have fine-tuned over the last few generations. There's so much that cannot be made to fit the frame, you just have to omit it. 

I digress. The guy genuinely believes the nonsense that he's been taught is true. It's nearly impossible for people like this to hop over to the reality based side of the fence. It's not just a national mythology, the whole lie is tied into his love for his family (even if he educated himself, a rejection of the lie would be tantamount to a rejection of his parents/grandparents, etc), and supports the biases and prejudices his family instilled in him from birth (all of which serve the same narrative, and are the work product of the last umpteen generations of the wealthy class) 

There are tens of millions of this guy. Happy serfs. And enlisted serfs? A robber baron's best friend. The ol' imperialist vanguard. They secure resources for the wealthy class in exchange for pennies and a misty-eyed elevation of their social standing in the eyes of fellow serfs. 

You're not going to change his mind. He HAS to believe the bullshit he's talking. HAS to. I'm all for correcting the record when one can, but don't expect him to ever accept or understand his own exploitation, or his part in the exploitation of others. Opposition to horseshit like his should always include a little pity, imo. Many of these all-day suckers would be great people of their lives had taken place within a system that encouraged something other than self-interest, lies, thievery, aggression, and pettiness.  

Oppose the stupid fucker, but try to remember he's a victim too. 

As for 'xboxmodman7369', well...  stupid is stupid, and there ain't no fixin' that.
